entities.name: Condition
entities.description: A condition is a specific state or situation that affects how something operates or functions, or it can refer to a requirement that must be met for something else to happen.

entities.name: Warning
entities.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

entities.name: Product
entities.description: A product refers to any material or item that serves as an input to be processed or transformed, as well as the output or finished result that comes from the process. It can include raw materials, components, or completed goods.

entities.name: Task
entities.description: A task is a specific piece of work or activity that needs to be done by an actor.

entities.name: Resource
entities.description: A resource is a system, component, controller, or actor that executes a process.

relations.name: task_has_warning
relations.description: Connects warnings to the task where the warning applies.

source.name: Warning
source.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

target.name: Task
target.description: A task is a specific piece of work or activity that needs to be done by an actor.

source.name: Product
source.description: A product refers to any material or item that serves as an input to be processed or transformed, as well as the output or finished result that comes from the process. It can include raw materials, components, or completed goods.

target.name: Task
target.description: A task is a specific piece of work or activity that needs to be done by an actor.

relations.name: product_has_warning
relations.description: Connects products to the warnings that apply to it.

source.name: Warning
source.description: A warning is a statement or indication that alerts someone to potential danger, risk, or a problem, advising them to take caution or avoid certain actions.

target.name: Product
target.description: A product refers to any material or item that serves as an input to be processed or transformed, as well as the output or finished result that comes from the process. It can include raw materials, components, or completed goods.

relations.name: task_has_condition
relations.description: Connects tasks to the conditions that are required for the execution or the conditions that are valid after its execution.

source.name: Condition
source.description: A condition is a specific state or situation that affects how something operates or functions, or it can refer to a requirement that must be met for something else to happen.

target.name: Task
target.description: A task is a specific piece of work or activity that needs to be done by an actor.

relations.name: product_has_condition
relations.description: Connects the product to any conditions it may require for its use.

source.name: Condition
source.description: A condition is a specific state or situation that affects how something operates or functions, or it can refer to a requirement that must be met for something else to happen.

target.name: Product
target.description: A product refers to any material or item that serves as an input to be processed or transformed, as well as the output or finished result that comes from the process. It can include raw materials, components, or completed goods.

relations.name: task_uses_resource
relations.description: Connects tasks to the resource that executes the task or is needed for its execution.

source.name: Task
source.description: A task is a specific piece of work or activity that needs to be done by an actor.

target.name: Resource
target.description: A resource is a system, component, controller, or actor that executes a process.

relations.name: task_uses_product
relations.description: Connects tasks with the product used in this task.

source.name: Product
source.description: A product refers to any material or item that serves as an input to be processed or transformed, as well as the output or finished result that comes from the process. It can include raw materials, components, or completed goods.

target.name: Task
target.description: A task is a specific piece of work or activity that needs to be done by an actor.
